name: Quantum TicTacToe
description: Quantum TicTacToe is a fun game to explore quantum physics concepts. On top of classical TicTacToe, you can turn up the quantumness to enable new moves! Put your squares in superpositions or entangle them with other squares, and what you thought was a lost game might just turn out to be a win. By playing the Quantum version of TicTacToe, you will be able to build intuition for the strangeness of the quantum realm.
